title: The Smash
brief_description: Harry (Stephen Blackburn of Tim and Debbie) is a member of a pop group - The Smash. Unfortunately his careless driving ends with an accident resulting in injuries to himself and his lead singer, and excessive damage to his car and a parked car. This program teaches about the legal and insurance consequences of car accidents.
